content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17, -50)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17, -50)) and a transport belt at position (-16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15, -50)) and a transport belt at position (-15.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that picks up from transport belt at position (-13.5, -51.5) and drops at position (-13.5, -49.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that picks up from position (-12.5, -48.5) and drops at position (-14.5, -48.5)

### Furnace at position(-10, -49)
Consists of a furnace (position (-10, -49)) with a burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) that picks up from a wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) and drops at position (-16.5, -45.5)

### Transport Belt System
Consists of multiple belt groups that connect the burner mining drills to the furnace and other entities on the map

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure that the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it
-  Check if the entity has enough space to hold the item being inserted

### Errors when using burners
-  Ensure that the burner has enough fuel to operate before attempting to use it
-  Check if the burner is waiting for source items before attempting to use it

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity

### NAMESPACE
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter`: an entity that inserts items into other entities
    *   `furnace`: an entity that smelts items
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: an entity that mines items
    *   `transport-belt`: an entity that transports items
    *   `wooden-chest`: an entity that stores items
*   Utility functions:
    *   `insert_item`: a function that inserts an item into an entity
    *   `place_entity`: a function that places an entity on the map
    *   `get_entity`: a function that retrieves an entity from the map
    *   `get_inventory`: a function that retrieves the inventory of an entity
